message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $110. I think it's a great deal for you considering its value.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet halfway and settle on $100?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
